name: Landing (Cicer0)
description:
Landing is a platformer with only one platform.

Enemies will emerge from the bottom of the screen, and the player must avoid their bullets while jumping on them for points. However, points are only kept when the player lands back on their platform, and can be lost by taking damage.

Controls:
A/W/S/D - Move the platform
Left/Right Arrows - Move the player left and right
Up Arrow - Jump
Down Arrow - Quick-fall
